metadata.name: Remote CHM File Download/Execution Via HH.EXE
metadata.comment: Detects the usage of "hh.exe" to execute/download remotely hosted ".chm" files.

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM process_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (activity_id = 1 AND lower(process.file.name) = lower('hh.exe') AND endswith(lower(process.name), lower('\\\\hh.exe')) AND (contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('http://')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('https://')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('\\\\'))))

output.summary: Detects the usage of "hh.exe" to execute/download remotely hosted ".chm" files.
